pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximately Unbiased P-Values via Multiscale Bootstrap // Calculating approximately unbiased (AU) p-values from multiscale bootstrap probabilities. See Shimodaira (2004) doi:10.1214/009053604000000823, Shimodaira (2008) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2007.04.001, Terada ans Shimodaira (2017) arXiv:1711.00949, and Shimodaira and Terada (2019) doi.org/10.3389/fevo.2019.00174.
